author: Bellular News
description:
Good news: two major publishers are tackling our frustration over torrents of low quality slop. Will this last? (no)

Join us at http://bellular.games for early access content, 20 editions of 'Loading Screen' a month and to support our team!

00:58 - Call Of Duty's Past
02:12 - The Slop Era Defined
04:43 - The Walkback
06:59 - Boots On The Ground
09:34 - Keeping Everyone Happy
